SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddSubjectController
Controller for handling adding a new subject to the database and UI for add subject fxml page
Application
Main entry point of the application
Assignment
Class for modeling an assignment item with necessary fields.
AssignmentManager
AssignmentManager for managing functionalities in IAssignmentDAO
AssignmentStatus
Enum class for storing assignment statuses.
CreateAssignmentController
Controller for managing creating a new Assignment, handles CRUD actions for assignments table
ErrorController
Controller for handling the display of error messages in the application.
FinanceController
A class to manage all the controls from the finance fxml page such as the text fields and labels.
GoalDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing goals in the database.
GoalListController
Controller for handling the display and management of goals in the application.
GoalsController
Controller responsible for handling user interactions on the goals page.
GPA
The GPA class represents a student's GPA record.
GPACalcController
The GPACalcController class handles the interactions between the GPA Calculator view and the logic for calculating and managing the GPA.
GPAManager
Class for managing GPA DAO functionalities
IAssignmentDAO
IAssignmentDAO for managing assignments in a data access object (DAO) or MockAssignmentDAO.
IController
Interface for controllers that need to inherit a parent controller Used for navigation to different pages in the application
IGPADAO
Interface for GPA DAO, includes the methods that Mock and Sqlite DAO's are going to implement
IJournalDAO
The IJournalDAO interface defines the methods for managing journal entries.
ISubjectDAO
ISubjectDAO defines the methods for managing subjects for subject DAO.
IUserDAO
Interface for the User Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the User class with the database.
Journal
Represents a journal entry with text, mood, and the user's username.
JournalController
Handles connection to the database and sets the main controller.
LoginController
Controller class that manages the logging user for the application.
MainController
Main controller for the application, responsible for managing the main layout and navigation.
MockAssignmentDAO
MockAssignmentDAO simulates a data access object for managing Assignment objects.
MockFinanceDAO
A class to act as a mock database
MockGoalDAO
A mock implementation of the GoalDAO to simulate database operations.
MockGPADAO
MockGPADAO for simulating a Data Access Object (DAO) for GPA records.
MockJournalDAO
Class simulates a Data Access Object (DAO) for managing journal entries.
MockSubjectDAO
The MockSubjectDAO class simulates a Data Access Object (DAO) for managing subjects.
MockUserDAO
Class for simulating access to the database for user-related operations.
NavBarController
Controller for the navigation bar of the application.
ProjectListController
Controller for handling the project list page.
ProjectsController
Controller for managing the project view and navigation to the assignment list.
ProjectsController.JournalController
Controller for the journal entry functionality.
RegisterController
The RegisterController class handles user registration in the application.
SqliteAssignmentDAO
SqliteAssignmentDAO provides data access methods for managing Assignment entities
SqliteConnection
Singleton class for managing a connection to a SQLite database.
SqliteFinanceDAO
A class for creating an SQL table and storing the data in it.
SqliteGPADAO
Class for managing GPA data access using SQLite.
SqliteJournalDAO
Manages database operations for journal entries using SQLite.
SqliteSubjectDAO
SqliteSubjectDAO provides data access methods for managing Subject entities
SqliteUserDAO
Implementation of the IUserDAO interface, managing database operations for user data using SQLite.
Subject
The Subject class represents a subject in the academic system.
SubjectManager
Class for managing subject data access operations.
User
Class for modelling a user
